attributes.action: Call for a vote of No confidence in Nicola Sturgeon
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon promised that she wouldn't try to impose a second referendum and she has done the exact opposite of that now. She is a threat to the United Kingdom and a threat to Scotland, which would be better off in the UK.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:


http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
